name: AutoGarden Tower Defense
description:
AutoGarden is a simple 2d tower defense game with 34 rounds, 2 bosses and 6 towers with 2 unique upgrade paths. Beat the final boss to get your very own gamer license*.

The browser version of the game -should- be fully playable from start to finish. Browser performance takes a hit in the later rounds, so I strongly recommend you download if you want to be a winner. Also both cardamom and flytrap had some internet problems and couldn't make it to html5 :(

This version (1.0) is free to download, but that won't be the case forever! 1.0 was released to gauge interest and see what people think of the game. A tip is always greatly appreciated** - and feedback is super helpful moving forward!

*advertised gamer license not actually included anywhere in version 1.0. you were directly lied to. deceived, even.
**this, however, is completely true.
